name: I am the captain.
description:
You are the captain! You might not be the best captain.

wasd to move, space to jump. Left and right click things to captain.

This game was made for Star Trek Jam! It took twentyish days. I hope you enjoy it and find it a little weird.

Music Credits:

"Swimmey Texture", "Phantoms from Space", "Serpentine Trek", and "Floating Cities" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
